thread.title: U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority Warns Commodity Firms Over Market Abuse
thread.title_full: U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority Warns Commodity Firms Over Market Abuse - WSJ

author: Alistair MacDonald
title: U.K.’s Financial Conduct Authority Warns Commodity Firms Over Market Abuse
text:
LONDON—The U.K.’s financial regulator said firms that trade commodities, from oil to gold, have learned little from recent high profile cases of market abuse and are failing to adequately monitor the risks of such abuse.
The Financial Conduct Authority said in an online newsletter that the commodities trading firms that it reviewed were complacent over the risks of market abuse. The FCA review also found that commodities specialists...
